alert.note: Alert for Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 12:32PM EDT until further notice by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Ohio, including the following county, Lorain. * WHEN...Until 230 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1231 PM EDT, Emergency management reported ongoing flooding in the warned area due to the heavy rainfall overnight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lorain, Elyria, Vermilion, Westlake, North Ridgeville, Avon Lake, Amherst, Grafton, Wellington, North Olmsted, Avon, Sheffield Lake, Eaton, Oberlin, Sheffield, Lagrange, Penfield, South Amherst, Pittsfield and Kipton.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
